word:
The highest work of God is the redemption of the fallen race. He calls for all the faculties and powers of His co-workers to be put to the tax for this one achievement, the salvation of souls, the triumph of His grace and love.--Letter 72, 1897, p. 3. (To S. N. Haskell and wife, Dec. 1, 1897.) 


                                  -372-
